Setting.name: Cancellation of Back Orders on Goods Received is Enabled
Setting.Description: When selected, it is possible to cancel back orders for goods received

Setting.name: Active New Migration Period
Setting.Description: The number of days that a product with status of 'Active New' can remain in before being automatically changed to 'Active Current'

Setting.name: Date Format
Setting.Description: Pattern used for displaying dates

Setting.name: Days Until Auto Cancel Purchase Order
Setting.Description: The number of days that a purchase order will sit in the Expired status before it is automatically cancelled

Setting.name: Days Until Auto Close Stock Count
Setting.Description: The number of days past the stock count start date before if is automatically closed

Setting.name: Store Chains
Setting.Description: Available chains for locations

Setting.name: Finance Email Address
Setting.Description: Email address to send notifications (eg. verify goods receipt costing) to

Setting.name: Zebra Printer Name
Setting.Description: The windows name of the Zebra Printer (case sensitive), it must be setup to accept RAW commands without spooling

Setting.name: Local Currency
Setting.Description: The local currency for use to display with costs

Setting.name: File Export Directory
Setting.Description: The directory that the save file exports to. The AppDomain must have permission to write to this directory

Setting.name: RP3 File Export Directory
Setting.Description: The directory that the RP3 exports save to. The AppDomain must have permission to write to this directory

Setting.name: RP3 Export Last X Days of Transactions
Setting.Description: The number of days in the past that transactions will be exported for RP3 transaction exports

Setting.name: RP3 Go Live Date
Setting.Description: Initial RP3 Export Date set at Go Live(N/A for Purchase Orders)

Setting.name: RP3 Send Files Interface Directory
Setting.Description: The directory containing the of the ""SendFilesInterface.bat"" RP3 export batch file

Setting.name: Price Rounding
Setting.Description: Calculated prices are rounded to the nearest value from this list

Setting.name: Product Tags
Setting.Description: Descriptive tags used to categorise products for search purposes

Setting.name: Reference Number Type
Setting.Description: The options for the purchase order reference numbers
Setting.Default: Container Number Delivery Note Number Invoice Number Customer Reference

Setting.name: Repossession Cost Markup
Setting.Description: The markup on cost price that is used to calculate the cost price for all repossessed items

Setting.name: Stock Count Questions
Setting.Description: Questions to be completed before starting a stock count
Setting.Default: Have you processed all goods receipts?

Setting.name: Goods on Loan Warehouse
Setting.Description: The location that is the Goods on Loan Warehouse

Setting.name: Store Type
Setting.Description: Category of store used for linking products and stores

Setting.name: Prices are Inclusive of Tax
Setting.Description: When selected, prices are considered inclusive of tax for sales purposes

Setting.name: Currencies
Setting.Description: Vendor costs can be specified in the following currencies

Setting.name: Vendor Tags
Setting.Description: Descriptive tags used to categorise vendors for search purposes

Setting.name: Goods Received Require Verification of Costs
Setting.Description: When selected, goods receipts for imported goods will need to have costs verified
